actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of certain persons who suffered damages arising from the flood caused by the breach, by the United States Army Corps of Engineers on July 27, 1981, of a cofferdam on the Salt River in the State of Missouri.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay specified sums to named individuals in full satisfaction of claims against the United States.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of certain persons who suffered damages arising from the flood caused by the breach, by the United States Army Corps of Engineers on July 27, 1981, of a cofferdam on the Salt River in the State of Missouri.
